name: Garry's Mod Dupe File
summary: A DUPE file contains an entity used by Garry's Mod, a physics sandbox game that revolves around building random objects. It stores an entity, which is an object, such as a chair, vehicle, building, or person that can be deployed in the game. DUPE files are used to share entities created by users with other users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
